entry.value: Metanode for computation of selected descriptive statistics for selected columns.%%00010%%00010Selected descriptive statistics are:%%00010count - count of numerical values%%00010mad - median absolute deviation%%00010max - maximum%%00010min - minimum%%00010median - median%%00010mean - mean%%00010sem - standard error of the mean%%00010sum - sum%%00010std - standard deviation%%00010var - variance%%00010%%00010Statistics are calculated using pandas DataFrame statistics, more details can be found e.g. here https://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/reference/frame.html#computations-descriptive-stats%%00010%%00010You can select what descriptive statistics should be calculated and common base name for newly added columns. New columns will be named as "base name""statistics name" (i.e. without any space or delimiter).%%00010%%00010=================%%00010%%00010Used programs and tools and their respective licenses at the time of the metanode creation. Version numbers and the licenses might differ based on your local installation. Please inspect your local installation and contact us if you can not locate your local version and or license terms.%%00010%%00010KNIME nodes (The KNIME nodes consists of the following GNU GPL 3.0 License. Licence terms are available here: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html)%%00010Python 3 (The Python consists of the following Python 3.10 License. Licence terms are available here: https://docs.python.org/3/license.html)%%00010Python package Pandas (The Pandas consists of the following BSD License. Licence terms are available here: https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause)%%00010%%00010The metanode was created in KNIME 4.5.2 running inside the docker image (https://hub.docker.com/r/cfprot/knime/), tag 4.5.2a.%%00010%%00010=================%%00010%%00010This version of metanode is available under the GNU GPL 3.0 License, unless stated otherwise. The full version of the license terms is available at https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html.%%00010Version: 2.0.0 from 2022-05-10%%00010Contact person: David Potesil (david.potesil@ceitec.muni.cz)%%00010More information can be found at https://github.com/OmicsWorkflows/KNIME_metanodes.
input table (may contain also columns not to be processed)
original table with added columns for descriptive statistics
